transcript:
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir good afternoon.
Customer: Ji good afternoon bataye na saheb.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha sir India Mart se kaisa chal raha hai.
Customer: Ji ji batao batao saheb batao main theek hoon aap kaise ho.
Executive: Badhiya badhiya sir wo aapka sir ek feedback mil aaya tha hamare paas sir.
Customer: Wo lead ko leke wo ha jo abhi last ka mere ko lead mila hai wo fake hai wo kyuki actually usse maine baat kara to wo bola mere ko aisa maine koi recommend kara hi nahi aap baat kar lijiye bhale usse.
Executive: Nahi sir hum baat nahi karte na buyer ka detail aapko provide karte hain sir to sir hamara match match.
Customer: Match wo mismatch tha na wo isiliye main keh raha hoon na aapko.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo saheb mana kar raha hai ki hai hi nahi aisa kuch mere ko aur isse pehle kal bhi mere ko ek DK international ka mila tha wo bhi hai na wo actually khud hi hai na company kuch aise chalate hain to unka mere ko lead reflect hua tha to unka koi bhi requirement nahi tha to isi vajah se main aapko keh raha tha wo jo buy mera lead hua hai na to uske liye main wapas se return ka isiliye maine complaint dala tha.
Executive: But sir reverse ka to aisa sir hota nahi hai sir ki matlab aapne aap log kabhi bolte ho reverse ka kabhi bolte ho jo genuine hai wahi cheez update kariye maine to aisa chaha nahi maine aapko.
Executive: Nahi mujhe mujhe mujhe pata hai sir ki bilkul sahi baat hai Natin sir problem aayi hai sir tabhi aapne sir ye feedback diya hai.
Customer: Bas bas bas actually kya hai sir ki aapne jaise by lead ka mujhe bataya na sir to wo na hum apne by lead team ko sir wo escalate kar sakte hain ki ye problem fir se na aaye inko check kare sir aise buyer.
Customer: Karo karo escalate main pehle bhi panch bar kam se kam teen char time kar chuka ye panchwa time hua shayad.
Executive: Main agree kar raha hoon sir already sir aapke aath ticket hue hain sir aur humne bhi sir highlight kiya tha aapka case shayad aapko last time hamare senior manager se bhi baat maine karwaya tha aapka hai na sir.
Customer: Uske baad bhi yahi uske baad bhi yahi face kar raha hoon main to.
Executive: Haan ji sir wahi main keh raha hoon sir ki jaise aapko humne by lead provide kiya as a match making platform agar agar aap by lead consume karte ho theek hai jaise abhi aapne kaha ki buyer mana kar raha hai to us cheez ko main apne team ko highlight kar sakta hoon yahan pe by lead team ko but agar aap bologe mujhe uska reverse main ye highlight kar dunga iska baki jo update aayega wo main aapko bata dunga but agar aap bologe ki reverse sir.
Customer: Haan kal bataiyega aap isko abhi kar dijiye kal abhi isko forward kar dijiye kal mere ko uska bata dijiyega kya revert raha aapki side se.
Executive: Achcha to abhi jo aapne by lead consume kiya hai sir ek minute main aapka check kar leta hoon sir.
Customer: Ye wala aapne kara hai na sir ki ye stone pedestal wash basin ka.
Customer: Yes yes yes yes isse pehle wo DK wala bhi tha ek ghar mandir ka tha wo bhi isi related tha but maine uska to nahi kara but aaj ka hi kara hai usko bhi chalo consider mat karo ye consider karke hi chalo aap kal iska mere ko aap revert dijiyega kya rahega.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai theek hai koi issue nahi sir.
Customer: Okay sir theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received fake and mismatch buyleads.

- Wants a refund for the buylead.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead process.

- Executive assured to highlight the issue to team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, complaint, escalation
